intro: A chilled-out life sim where you play, craft, and explore across magical islands. Build a house, grow a garden, nurture fantastic creatures, and make yourself at home!
description:
You wake up on a small island with no company except the local animals and lapping waves. Time to make yourself at home!

Garden of the Sea is a chilled-out first-person life sim where you play, craft, and explore at your own pace. Get to work adventuring and make progress, or stay where you are and let things gently take their course. You’ll be fine either way. There are no fail states here, just different ways to win. 

Features:
Cultivate your own garden, full of flowers and delicious veggies you can cook!
Complete quests to make progress and unlock rewards!
Befriend and nurture local creatures – birds, fish and more!
Build and upgrade your very own home, adding decorations and furnishings!
Explore the surrounding islands in your boat!
Become one with the world through the power of reactional music!

… and a whole lot more!
